Package commuterSim

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChartResults
    Generation of images for the "Results Chart" pane, using the open source package JFreeChart.
    ModelParams
    Create a simulation Model Parameters Panel, which will directly update the variables from sliders.
    Prefs
    A class designed to handle via a GUI Text fields updating of and access to the following simulation parameters: random seed (will not apply if negative) variation from rational choice min residents at each location max residents at each location Distribution of randomly generated preferred mode of transport probability of starting bad weather period max duration of bad weather period probability of starting roadworks max duration of roadworks
    SimRender
    Rendering of 2D graphics (bar chart) for the Simulator tab.
    Simulator
    The core of the simulation engine and some of the simulator tab GUI.
    Top
    Top level (main) class for a small application to simulate the switching of modes of transport by commuters depending on behaviour of other commuters and changes in the environment.
